column4: Hello, I have just installed ubuntu 9.10 and was going through installing some programming tools where I noticed Ultra Edit, It say it is free but when the installation completed it is asking to ultra edit is askin to pay
I work on multiple languages Java, PHP, Perl, Ruby, etc I use vim mainly. However some time I need an editor like crimson editor to edit files quickly.
